outputter module¶

Handles packaging values of interest for output.

outputter.createDictionary(data)¶

Creates dictionary fitting desired template from values of interest.

Parameters:data – numpy array of time and voltage data
Returns:dictionary with values of interest assigned to appropriate keys
outputter.createJSON(metrics, inputfilename)¶

Creates JSON file with metrics dictionary.

Parameters:
  • metrics – dictionary containing values of interest
  • inputfilename – original CSV filename input to program
Returns:

name of JSON file
